mapper.insert: insert into picture(post_id, memberNum, post_date, pyeongsu, housetype, style, area, hit, post_text) values(#{post_id}, #{memberNum}, now(), #{pyeongsu}, #{housetype}, #{style}, #{area}, 0, #{post_text});
mapper.update: update picture set post_date = now(), pyeongsu = #{pyeongsu}, housetype=#{housetype}, style=#{style}, area=#{area}, post_text=#{post_text} where post_id = #{post_id}
mapper.select: select * from picture order by post_id desc
mapper.update: update picture set hit = hit+1 where post_id = #{post_id}
